Text: a very good game with a ton of stuff to do in it

Thank you very very much. This game was the best game I ever played when I was younger, and I just found out the name of the game a few weeks ago.

Thanks mate. Have played this game so often and lost it. Now thanks to you i've found it again!
I agree with the previous users comments; thanks for uploading this great game!
